original_title: Germany’s Merz facing opposition over Ukraine troop plan – Bild — RT World News
article_summary: Switzerland offers immunity to Vladimir Putin for potential Ukraine peace talks, defying an International Criminal Court warrant. The Swiss Foreign Minister Ignazio Cassis stated that under certain conditions, Putin would be allowed to attend peace talks in Switzerland without fear of arrest. The possibility of a peace summit in Switzerland was also raised by French President Emmanuel Macron.</s>
